import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Retrieve an S3 bucket connector by ID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/log-shipping/s3-buckets/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns connection details for an S3 bucket connector by its ID. 
Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","description":"Logz.io ID of the S3 Bucket connector. You can run the relevant GET endpoints to retrieve the ID.","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accessKey"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"AWS S3 bucket access key","example":"ee07df5801500745419c6dff"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"secretKey"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"AWS S3 bucket secret key","example":"506d891fe2163a511b450eddc3279539f6"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"arn"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to uniquely identify the S3 bucket. To generate a new ARN, create a new IAM Role in your AWS admin console."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"bucket"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"AWS S3 bucket name","example":"AWS bucket"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"prefix"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Prefix of the AWS S3 bucket","example":"AWSLogs/7364988021587/myprefix"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"active"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"If `true`, the S3 bucket connector is active and logs are being fetched to Logz.io. If `false`, the connector is disabled.","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"addS3ObjectKeyAsLogField"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"If `true`, enriches logs with a new field detailing the S3 object key.","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"region"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`US_EAST_1`, `US_EAST_2`, `US_WEST_1`, `US_WEST_2`, `EU_WEST_1`, `EU_WEST_2`, `EU_WEST_3`, `EU_CENTRAL_1`, `AP_NORTHEAST_1`, `AP_NORTHEAST_2`, `AP_SOUTHEAST_1`, `AP_SOUTHEAST_2`, `SA_EAST_1`, `AP_SOUTH_1`, `CA_CENTRAL_1`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Specify one supported AWS region.","enum":["US_EAST_1","US_EAST_2","US_WEST_1","US_WEST_2","EU_WEST_1","EU_WEST_2","EU_WEST_3","EU_CENTRAL_1","AP_NORTHEAST_1","AP_NORTHEAST_2","AP_SOUTHEAST_1","AP_SOUTHEAST_2","SA_EAST_1","AP_SOUTH_1","CA_CENTRAL_1"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"logsType"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`elb`, `vpcflow`, `S3Access`, `cloudfront`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["elb","vpcflow","S3Access","cloudfront"],"description":"Specifies the log type being sent to Logz.io. Determines the parsing pipeline used to parse and map the logs. [Learn more about parsing options supported by Logz.io](/user-guide/log-shipping/built-in-log-types.html).","example":"elb"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"accessKey\": \"ee07df5801500745419c6dff\",\n  \"secretKey\": \"506d891fe2163a511b450eddc3279539f6\",\n  \"arn\": \"string\",\n  \"bucket\": \"AWS bucket\",\n  \"prefix\": \"AWSLogs/7364988021587/myprefix\",\n  \"active\": true,\n  \"addS3ObjectKeyAsLogField\": true,\n  \"region\": \"US_EAST_1\",\n  \"logsType\": \"elb\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
